类 Circle

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractShape
      • Circle
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Comparable<Shape>, Shape
    public class Circle
extends AbstractShape
    This class represents a circle. It offers all the operations mandated by the Shape interface.

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 AbstractShape

        reference

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器 说明
      Circle​(double radius)
      Construct a circle object with the given radius.
      Circle​(double x, double y, double radius)
      Construct a circle object using the given center and radius

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      double area()
      Computes and returns the area of this shape.
      double perimeter()
      Computes and returns the perimeter of this shape.
      Shape resize​(double factor)
      Create and return a shape of the same kind as this one, resized in area by the provided factor
      java.lang.String toString()  

      • 从类继承的方法 AbstractShape

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Circle

        public Circle​(double x,
              double y,
              double radius)
        Construct a circle object using the given center and radius
        参数:
        x - x coordinate of the center of this circle
        y - y coordinate of the center of this circle
        radius - the radius of this circle

      • Circle

        public Circle​(double radius)
        Construct a circle object with the given radius. It is centered at (0,0)
        参数:
        radius - the radius of this circle

    • 方法详细资料

      • area

        public double area()
        从接口复制的说明: Shape
        Computes and returns the area of this shape.

        the area of the shape

      • perimeter

        public double perimeter()
        从接口复制的说明: Shape
        Computes and returns the perimeter of this shape.
        返回:
        the perimeter of the shape

      • resize

        public Shape resize​(double factor)
        从接口复制的说明: Shape
        Create and return a shape of the same kind as this one, resized in area by the provided factor
        参数:
        factor - factor of resizing
        返回:
        the resized Shape
